ComicInfo.Title: Prelude
ComicInfo.Summary:
As a little girl, Baba Yaga's mother uses stories of the Dream Eater to get her to go to bed. Later when the Dark One breaks into their home to take the Book of the Lost, her mother tries to reassure her - saying good will always triumph over evil. But the Dark One kills her mother and Thane arrives too late to help. Baba Yaga decides that her mother was wrong - good does not always triumph over evil. This sets her on a lifetime course of vengeance.
With the battle against Orcus won, Druanna directs Bolder to help Blake in his quest to reform the High Council while she will accompany Sela to Limbo to free Erik's soul. But before they can leave, Belinda appears, attacks them and abducts Sela through a magical portal. Meanwhile, Orcus plucks one of Blake's arrows from a dead orc and uses its special properties with a special incantation to hurl it over the gates and kill King William.
In the early days of Myst, shadow dragons were a terrible scourge until they ended up destroying themselves. Gruel has been transformed into a shadow dragon and makes Sela the target of his vengeance. But as Gruel takes Sela, Blake utters an incantation that allows him to fire an arrow into the dragon's heart.
As the siege of Tallus begins, Blake and Bolder help the King's army defend the city against the army of Orcus. Meanwhile, Druanna is almost completely drained of power and Sela is unable to control her power. But working together, Druanna is able to control Sela's power which sends a torrent of water that drowns the orc army outside the city gates. With the enemy defenses depleted by his army's attack, Orcus performs a last transformation of his friend, Gruel, who turns into a dragon and attacks the city.
The townspeople begin to turn on Sela and her companions, but Druanna and King William intercede. William proclaims they will be taken into custody until he determines how to respond to Orcus' demands. That night he decides to accept Orcus' terms, but before his orders can be carried out, Druanna uses all the power she can summon to rescue Sela, Blake and Bolder and take them to her garden.
Sela, Bolder and Blake enter Tallus and meet the High Priestess Druanna. But shortly after, Orcus and his army arrive outside the city gates. Orcus announces to the people of Tallus that he will spare their children if they deliver Sela to him and kill Bolder and Blake.
Sela, Blake (Realm Knight of Wonderland) and Bolder (a dwarf) travel together to Tallus to see the high priestess, each with their own reasons. On the way they battle orc scouts from an army Orcus is leading to siege Tallus. The story also reveals how Gruel, Orcus' most trusted servant, came to pledge his loyalty to Orcus.
